DOC.brief_title: Treatment Early RA : Minocycline Combination With Methotrexate v Methotrexate Alone
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine combination methotrexate minocycline work well methotrexate alone early Rheumatoid Arthritis ( RA ) . Specific aim study : A . To demonstrate combination minocycline methotrexate well tolerate use first year RA . B . To compare efficacy combination minocycline methotrexate methotrexate placebo therapy early sero-positive RA patient .
DOC.criteria: Age equal 19 year old less equal 75 year old Diagnosis RA determine fulfil 4 7 ACR criterion Positive rheumatoid factor Duration disease : great six week less one year Allergy tetracycline methotrexate Previous DMARD treatment Doses oral steroid great 7.5 mg/day Intraarticular injection within last four week Significant liver renal disease active peptic ulcer disease Patients willing abstain alcohol consumption Women childbearing potential practicing successful method contraception
